Title: Prohibits the sale of food containing Red Dye 3 and Red Dye 40 in certain schools
Summary: Prohibits the sale of food containing Red Dye 3 and Red Dye 40 in public schools from the beginning of the day until the last scheduled meal period.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of food containing Red Dye 3 and Red Dye 40 in certain schools
